meanings.sent1: The intervallic spacing between the trees allowed sunlight to filter through.
meanings.sent2: The musician focused on creating beautiful intervallic harmonies in the song.
meanings.sent3: The intervallic pattern of the wallpaper made the room feel like a musical space.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved in an intervallic rhythm, like notes on a musical scale.
meanings.sent5: The intervallic relationship between the characters added depth to the story.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to musical intervals.
meanings.sent1: The composer carefully considered the intervallic structure of the melody.
meanings.sent2: Students learn about intervallic relationships between notes in music theory.
meanings.sent3: The intervallic differences in pitch created a unique sound.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared with an intervallic grace that mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The intervallic progression of chords set the mood for the entire piece.

meanings.sent1: The intervallic pauses between his words added suspense to the story.
meanings.sent2: The journey was marked by intervallic stops at scenic viewpoints.
meanings.sent3: The intervallic breaks in the routine brought a sense of excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her paintings captured the intervallic changes of light throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: The intervallic structure of the building allowed for natural ventilation.
